Title: Requires the state to reimburse municipalities for loss of real property tax revenue resulting from establishment of community residential facilities
Summary: Requires the state to reimburse municipalities for loss of real property tax revenue resulting from the establishment of community residential facilities for the disabled.
LawCode: Amd ยง41.34, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring the state to reimburse municipalities for loss of real property tax revenue resulting from establishment of community residential facilities
